# Device Attributes

- [Stable Attributes](#stable-attributes)
  - [device.brand](#devicebrand)
  - [device.family](#devicefamily)
  - [device.model](#devicemodel)

## Stable Attributes

### device.brand

The brand of the device.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | false |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | No |
| Example | `Apple` |

### device.family

The family of the device.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | false |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | No |
| Example | `iPhone` |

### device.model

The model of the device.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | false |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | No |
| Example | `iPhone 15 Pro Max` |
